name: Rummy Cubes
description:
Rummy classic game using tiles.
Drop a tile on the top of another for creating runs.
Play against 1, 2 or 3 players (on iPad, just 1 on iPhone).
Or, play and chat online, over the internet, against another player.
Drop 30 points for initial drop.
Rearrange tiles on the table as you wish, as long as the table stays valid.
Touch instructions for full instructions.
